page.title: 12Teenage Fashion.
page.content: The teenagers of today wear tight or baggy jeans,and bold patterned tops. The girls wear short skirts,and the boys,wear trousers pleated around the waistband. Fluorescent socks and matching colour co_ordinated shoes are a must for "gear" as it is called. Make-up is worn by girls. A wide range can be bought in almost any colour.Particularly popular, are gold stick_on shapes for the eyes and face.Fashionable hairstyles are important too. Another feature is the jewellery worn.Some boys and many girls have pierced ears allowing them to wear a variety of earrings which may be in the shape of telephones,fruit,stars and skeletons.Coloured bangles and large beads are worn. The clothes, make_up and jewellery can be bought at boutiques and stalls.
